Version 2.0.79 - Fix Position Bar Jumping to Furthest After Post-Intercept Write

Bug Fixes

  • Fix position bar jumping to furthest slide when post-intercept writes boosted suspend_data to DB
  • DOM MutationObserver no longer picks up boosted DB values as real navigation events

Changes

  • Update lastSuspendData after all direct suspend_data writes that bypass the LMSSetValue interceptor
  • Covers init backing store, post-intercept tag, and post-intercept non-tag writes
  • Same fix applied for both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004 handlers (6 locations total)

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.78: Fix re-entrant LMSSetValue processing modified suspend_data as navigation
  • v2.0.77: Fix position bar jumping to furthest (poll reading boosted lesson_location from DB)
  • v2.0.76: Captivate SCORM real-time position tracking via content variables
